net.kebernet.skillz.format

Class AbstractBundleFormatter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kebernet.skillz.format.AbstractBundleFormatter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatter<T>

    public abstract class AbstractBundleFormatter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter<T>
    An abstract Formatter implementation for creating a formatter from Bundles.

      • AbstractBundleFormatter

        public AbstractBundleFormatter(@Nonnull
                               Bundle bundle,
                               @Nullable
                               Bundle repromptBundle)
        Constructs an new instance. If you provide a reprompt bundle with the constructor, it will build an Ask response.
        Parameters:
        bundle - The Bundle to use to format the response.
        repromptBundle - Optional bundle for preprompt
